title: Va Madhi Vadhana Lyrics Vaaliba Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Va Madhi Vadhana
Singer(s): Radhan, Mukesh, Blaaze
Movie: Vaaliba Rajan
Music: Radhan
Lyrics: Karky

Girl I'm loving you like a
rain tomorrow.
Girl I'm loving you
now your heart I need to borrow
Girl I'm loving you like that
gonna blow my mind
Girl I'm in love for the very first time.

Vaa madhi vadhana kulappida vaa
ivan vaanathai kaluvi kavilthida vaa
dhivan vaasalai thelikka palakkida vaa
un vaathiuyam ivan en isaiththida vaa

lets go move your body
o go shake that body
common common move it for me
dance with me.

lets go move your body
common konjam shake that body
o go move it for me
dance with me.

Kaiyyil rendu bomma thandha
manda pichi oduvaaney
endha bomma vachi aada
kettu kettu kolluvaaney.

Yelele kuzhappam, ellaamey kuzhappam
adhu illana un vazhkka kasakkum.
idhu varaikkum ellaamey mayakkam
ini inithaan kuzhappamey thodakkam.

when you play with my mind down
i'm feeling like am
loosing mind loosing control
idhu enna enna yedho seidhaai
are you the one girl, are you my soul ?

Let me tell what it is
that am feeling inner feeling inner
which you feeling that too

Kadhal endru sonnaal anbae
baby i love youu.

vaa ila madhana kuzhambida vaa
indha vazhkayin kuzhappangal rasithidadaa
ini unakkena mudivugal eduththidathaan
ival vanathil irundhu ingu irangi vandhaal

Kannu mela vellari vachi
kannaa moochi aaduvaaley.
un kai kaalil noola katti
bommalaattam kaattuvaaley.

Vaayil poottu maatti vittu
coffee-ya pottu neettuvaa.

Yelele kuzhappam, ellaamey kuzhappam
adhu illana un vazhkka kasakkum.
idhu varaikkum ellaamey mayakkam
ini inithaan kuzhappamey thodakkam.
